properties.description: Handles the location of its segment childs
properties.name: direction

properties.description: Limit for the segment when resizing by gutter
properties.name: minSegmentSize

methods.description: Adds the bookmark to the bookmarks container
methods.name: addBookmark

methods.description: Makes the segment passed as parameter to be on cover al the docker
methods.name: fullscreen

methods.description: Exists the current fullscreen
methods.name: fullscreenExit

methods.description: We iterate through the content children and add the segments found to the array
methods.name: getChildSegments

params.description: Docker/segment which childs we are trying to get
params.name: holder

methods.description: When releasing the event outside of any droppable area we will drop in the last detected
methods.name: handleDragEnd

methods.description: Shows the detection area to drop the segment
methods.name: handleDragEnter

methods.description: Allows the dropping
methods.name: handleDragOver

methods.description: Handles the first step of dragging a segment tab
methods.name: handleDragStart

methods.description: Handles the drop
methods.name: handleDrop

methods.description: Depending on where we are hovering and different requeriments we will trigger the corresponding drop function
methods.name: handleDropSituation

methods.description: Hides all the active detection areas
methods.name: hideDetectionAreas

methods.description: Hides the drop indicator
methods.name: hideDropIndicator

methods.description: Hides the tabs indicator
methods.name: hideTabsIndicator

methods.description: Moves to drop indicator
methods.name: moveDropIndicator

methods.description: Resets all the sizes of its segment childs
methods.name: redistributeContentSpace

methods.description: Removes the bookmark to the bookmarks container
methods.name: removeBookmark

methods.description: Removes the segment depending on the situation, it also handles its childs when the segment is removed
methods.name: removeHolderIfRequired

params.description: Element we want to check if it has to be removed
params.name: segment

methods.description: Removes the segment and handles its child
methods.name: removeWrapper

methods.description: Sets up the nodes in which we will move the bookmarks when needed
methods.name: setupBookmarks

methods.description: Moves the content from the dockers root to a new content node
methods.name: setupContent

methods.description: Sets up the fullscreen nodes
methods.name: setupFullscreen

methods.description: Creates the mouse move/release events to resize the gutter segments
methods.name: setupGutterResizeEvents

methods.description: Checks if we can avoid the inner dropping and the creation of the wrapper when it has the same direction as its holder
methods.name: shouldRedirectToOuterDrop

methods.description: Activates the detection areas to interact with them
methods.name: showDetectionArea
